Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.com.Models.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This java file is used to define a player in the game Contains all the attributes of a player.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String p_name)
    This is a default constructor which is used in the beginning of the game to get player's name and assign random countries.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String p_name)
      This is a default constructor which is used in the beginning of the game to get player's name and assign random countries.
      Parameters:
      p_name - Input from user requesting the Player's name

  • Method Details

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry(Country p_country)
      When a player takes over a country, this method is used to add that country in their Country list. Can also be used to add country to player's list.
      Parameters:
      p_country - Country name

    • issueOrder

      public void issueOrder()
      d_currentOrder.getD_armyCount() -> Input given by the user indicating the number of soldiers they want to deploy
      d_armyCount -> is the actual size of army present with the user
      If successful, then the order is added to the order list and army count is reduced.

    • nextOrder

      public Order nextOrder()
      Moves to the next order
      Returns:
      The next order, or null if no orders are left

    • get_name

      public String get_name()
      Gets the player's name
      Returns:
      d_name Player's name

    • set_name

      public void set_name(String p_name)
      Sets the player's name
      Parameters:
      p_name - Used to set the new player's name

    • get_armyCount

      public int get_armyCount()
      Gets the current player's army count
      Returns:
      d_armyCount Size of the army the current player holds

    • set_armyCount

      public void set_armyCount(int p_armyCount)
      Sets the size of current player's army
      Parameters:
      p_armyCount - Size of army

    • get_countries

      public List<Country> get_countries()
      Gets the list of countries owned by the player
      Returns:
      d_countries List of Countries

    • set_countries

      public void set_countries(List<Country> p_countries)
      Sets the list of countries held by the player
      Parameters:
      p_countries - List of Country objects under player's ownership

    • get_orderList

      public List<Order> get_orderList()
      Gets the list of orders issued by the player
      Returns:
      d_orderList List of orders issued by the player

    • set_orderList

      public void set_orderList(List<Order> p_orderList)
      Sets the list of orders issued by the player
      Parameters:
      p_orderList - List of orders issued by the player

    • get_currentOrder

      public Order get_currentOrder()
      Gets the current Order of the current player that is being issued
      Returns:
      d_currentOrder of the current player that is being issued

    • set_currentOrder

      public void set_currentOrder(Order p_currentOrder)
      Sets the current Order of the current player that is being issued
      Parameters:
      p_currentOrder - current Order of the current player that is being issued

    • get_continents

      public List<Continent> get_continents()
      Gets the list of continents held by the player
      Returns:
      d_continents List of continents the player owns

    • set_continents

      public void set_continents(List<Continent> p_continents)
      Sets the list of continents held by the player
      Parameters:
      p_continents - List of Continent objects under player's ownership
